title: The dead mans real speech a funeral sermon preached on Hebr. xi. 4, upon the 29th day of April, 1672 : together with a brief of the life, dignities, benefactions, principal actions, and sufferings, and of the death of the said late Lord Bishop of Durham / published (upon earnest request) by Isaac Basire ...
author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.
publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for James Collins ...,
